patthana24.4:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:1.1_1: Nahetuṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:1.1_2: Nahetuṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo ca nahetu āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.4:2.1_0: Nanahetuṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana24.4:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ noāsavañca nanahetuṁ noāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana24.4:4.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana24.4:5.1_0: Nanahetuṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:5.1_1: Nanahetuṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:5.1_2: Nanahetuṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu noāsavo ca nahetu noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.4:6.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanoāsavañca nanahetuṁ nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana24.4:7.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:8.1_0: Nahetuṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:9.1_0: Nanahetuṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:10.1_0: Nahetuṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:11.1_0: Nahetuṁ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:12.1_0: Nahetuṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:13.1_0: Nahetuṁ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:14.1_0: Nahetuṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:15.1_0: Nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:16.1_0: Nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
